attributes.action: Make the British Armed Forces only deployable oversea's under a national referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is not meant to weaken the armed forces but to restrict there use, any treaty of protection, invasion of British territory and alliance's should be the only times when the army should mobilize on the governments request. 

The war in Iraq saw around 1 million Briton's opposed to it and campaigning against it in the streets of London, which was ultimately ignored.
If this law was in place that war (at least for Britain would not have taken place).

Although it is true that many possible future targets for the British army may be Autocratic or semi-autocratic, this does not make up for the large amount of civilian deaths that take place in most wars. Also the aftermath of wars can course the country or even the region to become unstable.Not to mention the financial cost of wars the Iraq war for example cost £4.5 billion as of 2006.
